entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DllImport from libc should support loading symbols from the global relocation table #65165
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms failed at Decode as the Asn1Tag class is ContextSpecific instead of Universal #65163
  • Proposal: Add Temporary and Sparse and to FileOptions #65155
  • [DllImportGenerator] `DefaultDllImportSearchPathsAttribute` should be forwarded to local p/invoke #65154
    7.0.0
  • Loading issue when RID is linux-musl-x64 on Alpine 3.15 #65152
  • Unify opcode generators #65150
  • [API Proposal]: INumber<T> should not implement IUnaryNegationOperators<T, T> #65147
  • [API Proposal]: PemEncoding.WriteString #65144
    Future
  • Services resolving incorrectly in Development environment but not Production #65145
  • JIT: x*x*x*x -> (x*x)*(x*x) transformation #65141
  • Remove DataSet/DataTable code paths for SerializationFormat.Binary #65140
    Future
  • Proxy credentials issue in SocketsHttpHandler #65138
    7.0.0
  • WebHeaderCollection.this[string] and WebHeaderCollection.Remove(string) does not use the name of the header when throwing exception for invalid chars #65136
  • OptimizedInboxTextEncoder's ctor makes it impossible to allow '+' despite UTF-7's removal #65130
  • ﻿"Unable to load DLL 'libcups': The specified module could not be found." #65121
  • Can not find tag 6.0.2(839cdfb) in main repo? #65117
  • CI failure in JIT/Methodical/cctor/misc/throw_cs_do/throw_cs_do.sh #65115
  • TypeSystem: Support ref structs within generics #65112
    7.0.0

Closed

  • TokenBucketRateLimiter.WaitAsync() does not immediately reduce the _queueCount on cancellation #64078
    7.0.0
  • SymLinksMayExistIndependentlyOfTarget failure #65119
    Future
  • Consider Removing Unity and StructureMap from DependencyInjection.ExternalContainers.Tests #64988
    7.0.0
  • [Mono Android][Test] tracing/eventactivityidcontrol/eventactivityidcontrol fails on Android #52763
    7.0.0
  • General Version Change Question on Activity.AddBaggage() method from System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource #65149
  • [Arm64] LoadPairVector64 and LoadPairVector128 #39243
    .NET 7.0
  • RemoteExecutor: String 'True' was not recognized as a valid Boolean. #65143
  • [mono][fullaot] Calling static virtual method from a generic method leads to "Attempting to JIT" error #65002
    7.0.0
  • The response ended prematurely #62963
    7.0.0
  • ASP.NET service Segmentation fault in Docker container with .NET 6.0 #64282
  • .NET 6.0 OpenSsl 3.0 TlsHandshake error #64448
    7.0.0
  • AccessViolationException in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Json_FromString<MyEventsListerViewModel>.Jil_ benchmark #64657
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Regression\\GitHub_43569\\GitHub_43569\\GitHub_43569.cmd #63859
    7.0.0
  • EventWaitHandle can be named, but has no Name property #43997
    7.0.0
  • RegionInfo(4096) behaves differently depending on preceding method calls #64893
  • Consider changing the nullability for generic MemoryCache.Set methods #65107
    7.0.0
  • Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #22928
    7.0.0
  • Debugging Blazor WASM project running from a directory with special characters fails to #62856
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingToExternalHostWithLowTtlTest Failures #65065
  • A given header is not correctly updated when added while calling AddHttpClient #65094
  • Regressions from recent change in Enumerable/String #64992
  • [Docker] The framework 'Microsoft.NETCore.App', version '6.0.0' (x64) was not found. #64862
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'isGeneralRegister(reg3)' on R2R_CG2 linux-arm64 outerloop #64936
    7.0.0
  • EventSource_SuccessfulHandshake_LogsStartStop failures on Windows11 #63008
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Include IsNetCoreAppRef in assembly version calculation for servicing #65166
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove GeneratedDllImportAttribute.PreserveSig #65164
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Move UnconditionalSuppressMessageAttributes from xml to .cs files for Syndication Library #65161
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication
  • Add a few more regex generator malformed input tests #65159
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add Maui performance scenarios to release6.0 runtime #65158
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix DacEnumerableHashTable enumerator #65157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • Increase arm32/arm64 maximum instruction group size #65153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use lite ciphers for CNG one shots #65151
    area-System.Security
  • Clean the OpenSSL error queue more consistently #65148
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid InitialTarget in libs tree for CoreLib #65146
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update StyleCopAnalyzers to 1.2.0-beta.406 #65142
    area-Meta
  • Obsolete and put SerializationFormat.Binary behind an appcontext switch #65139
    area-System.Data
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "on frame evaluation" of functions returning char #65135
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use SECPKG_ATTR_REMOTE_CERT_CHAIN to retrieve server cert during handshake #65134
    area-System.Net.Security
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65131
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Captures support for NonBacktracking #65129
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fixes for CFG dispatcher on ARM64 #65127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Respect source generator projects in slngen #65124
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Subtract instead of building the cartesian product in targets #65123
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add a test for control flow guard #65122
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • update SSL tests to deal better with disabled protocols #65120
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • JIT: fgMorphModToSubMulDiv should not reorder operands #65118
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Clean unused files from emsdk when provisioning #65116
    area-Build-mono
  • Move test with expected crash to outerloop #65114
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Merged

  • Implement LoadPairVector64 and LoadPairVector128 #64864
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update RateLimiter queues on cancellation #64825
    area-System.Threading
  • Update linux-instructions.md for .NET 6/7 #65160
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable System.Threading.Channels.Tests #65083
    arch-wasm
  • Removing Unity and StructureMap from DependencyInjection.ExternalContainers.Tests #65091
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Copy propagation tweaking #64378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
    area-System.Diagnostics, os-android
  • disable TotalMemory2 test from gcstress runs #65110
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix bool.TryParse/Format on big-endian systems #65078
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add exports to workaround emscripten bug #64807
    area-Build-mono
  • Mark cctor tests with RequiresProcessIsolation property #65036
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable ILVerify for source build #65082
    Servicing-approved, area-ILVerification, 6.0.3
  • [mono] Fix support for calls to static virtual methods from gshared c… #65126
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix too wide memory accesses for nullchecks #64683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing a runtime check and test to match the EnableISA flag behavior #65096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix RegionInfo creation when using LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED LCID #64927
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Fix nullable annotations for `MemoryCacheExtensions` #65133
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Optimize `StringBuilder.Insert`. #64922
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #64998
  • Enable set of nullability checks in NativeAOT CoreLib #64730
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Add arm64 SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 Abs #65086
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixed debugger attachment to a project with special characters in the path. #64527
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Clean-up DllImportGenerator packaging infra #64810
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingToExternalHostWithLowTtlTest #65075
    area-System.Net
  • Update Parallel.ForEachAsync.cs (2) #65009
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Overwrite existing inc file in h2inc #65113
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: verify containment safety before forming address modes #65048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't throw from RemoteExecutor on SkipTestExceptions #65105
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono] Decompress ICU data during iOS/tvOS app startup #64967
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #63546
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Second round of changing null checks to !! #65108
    area-Meta
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Introduce `GenTreeDebugOperKind` #64498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add Credscan suppressions #65030
    * NO MERGE *, area-Meta
  • Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #64997
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, community-contribution
  • Draft for x ^ 0 opt (#65071) #65072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for iOS runtime tests #64952
  • Use ValueStringBuilder to fix allocations in ToString() methods of XdsDateTime and XsdDuration #64868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64556
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_U opcode #64914
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.3
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Print out the ws: address #64838
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Remove USE_ZLIB=1 and include the sources instead #64907
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.3
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • FileSystemWatcher.Linux: handle races while adding child directories. #64906
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] update expected exception for cases when all requested TLS versions are disabled #65046
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Build improvements #64938
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64648
    area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #65089
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Port ICU tests fix for server core x86 #65038
    area-System.Globalization
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • fix few Filesystem tests on FreeBSD #65059
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, test enhancement
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector{64, 128} on Arm64 Part I #64961
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP: CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable tests on Debug CoreClr that are already disabled on Checked CoreClr #64891
    area-Meta
  • Infra for regeneration of third-party-notices file #60091
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Delegate Method Data Error #1853

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Initial support for IsVirtualVtable calls #1768

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for GT_STORE_OBJ and GT_OBJ #1825
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] map runtimeimports to their native name for ldftn #1843
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable support for WASI SDK #1850

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WPF App corrupted when using GitHub Action setup-dotnet for .NET 6 #23870

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.2xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.2xx SDK #sdk-120042-.NET6.0.2xxSDK #22924
  • dotnet restore "error NU1100: Unable to resolve '{package}' for 'net5.0'" when dotnet-sdk-6.0 installed #23874
  • Reference assemblies in publish output #23869
  • 'Could not load file or assembly' exception when referencing console app from web app #23477
    Discussion
  • Webdeploy fails | Serving HTML Files with DotNetCore on IIS #23803

PullRequests

Created

  • Hard code a few system.net.http versions #23871
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23862
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • 6.0.201 servicing branding #23831
    Area-Infrastructure, Branding
  • Embed fSharp.Core --- retarget to release/6.0.3xx branch #23856
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1604390 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • Proposal: extend the set of things allowed in expression trees #2545
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Revise operator overload resolution in checked-user-defined-operators.md #5740

Updated

  • Update links to the spec documents to point to the ECMA standard draft #5739

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • List patterns: x is [..var y] with a custom collection type causes a crash #59466
  • List patterns: no error is emitted when Length is missing or inaccessible #59465
  • NRE in DeclarationNameCompletionProvider.ProvideCompletionsAsync #59463
  • Test plan for CheckedUserDefinedOperators feature #59458
  • Implement LSP breakpoint placement request #59455
    17.2
  • compile error when using function pointer in Expression<> #59454
  • ToString format specifier completion for Guid shows DateTime specifiers instead #59453
  • Pattern matching null check should be eliminated if has been checked #59449

Closed

  • VS 2017 C# redundant assignment suggestion not shown #50059
    Backlog
  • [Flaky Test] CSharp.CSharpCodeActions.AddUsingExactMatchBeforeRenameTracking #57982
    17.1
  • IntelliSense for LINQ function to suggest predicates #50333
    Backlog
  • Requests for the "inline parameter name hints" feature #51161
    Backlog
  • VS grey out the whole expression when using extra parentheses #51813
    Backlog
  • No Justification info in sarif 2.1. #48972
    Backlog
  • IDE0054 false positive in object initializer #52112
    Backlog
  • Simplify new expression (IDE0090) inappropriately raised for ASP.NET MVC 6 project. #52301
    Backlog
  • Compound Assignment Operator does not highlight #54208
    Backlog
  • Struct generated by "convert to struct" refactoring should implement "IEquatable<T>", operator== and operator != #54767
    Backlog
  • Consider having quick info for lambdas show the natural type of the lambda #54792
    Backlog
  • Intellisense does not work on pointers passed into functions #54919
    Backlog
  • Intellisense doesn't work on pointers in the context of parameters #58081
    Backlog
  • Copy method summary for abstract methods (c#) #54928
    Backlog
  • Convert to switch statement changes behavior #55938
    Backlog
  • File-scoped namespace puts semicolon on newline if a comment exists #56232

PullRequests

Created

  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE
  • Remove nonsensical nullability attributes when implementing interfaces. #59467
    Area-IDE
  • Improve 'use pattern matching' to use `is null` instead of `is not object` #59464
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59461
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inverting TypeOf should support 'TypeOf x IsNot...' #59460
    Area-IDE
  • Generate proper explicit interface impls #59459
    Area-IDE
  • Remove integration tests that are already ported to the new project #59457
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Use BatchFixer to fix all for naming violation #59452
    Area-IDE
  • Address feedback from previous pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> change #59451
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix "Add Constructor Parameter From Members" for partial classes #59450
    Area-IDE
  • Improve trivia handling in use-block body. #59448
    Area-IDE
  • Do not use 'var' when fixing the return type of method #59447
    Area-IDE
  • Pass exception into internal error diagnostic #59443
    Area-Interactive
  • Classify interface static constructors #59442
    Area-IDE
  • Batch file notifications and acquire locks asynchronously #59441
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update Language Feature Status.md #59468
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Support raw UTF8 String Literals #59390
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Update BuildValidator to exclude refint folders. #59462
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #59399
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Build with last released VS2022 in CI #59444
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix completion not working for pointer-typed parameters #59143
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not use implicit object creation on nullable struct types #59438
    Area-IDE
  • Fxi mispeeling #59440
    Area-IDE
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • Include record primary constructor props in nav-to when not backed by a corresponding field/prop. #59437
    Area-IDE
  • 'Add selected parameters to constructor' should respect existing user formatting #59432
    Area-IDE
  • Suppress formatting with implicit object initializers #59430
    Area-IDE
  • Move option to right category #59425
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Support wrapping constructs even in the presence of some recoverable errors #59385
    Area-IDE
  • Change json detection from a suggestion to a refactoring #59422
    Area-IDE
  • Fix the titles we show the user for the 'use is null' fixers #59409
    Area-IDE
  • Move cancellation catch up out of the navigate to searcher #59439
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Finalize New Inline Rename UI #59351
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ide analyzer options #58765
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for lsp jsonrpc request handling #57834
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade to Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry 16.4.29 #59426
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServieHub project - take 3 #59316
    Area-IDE
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers
  • LSP breakpoint placement #59428
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Assert diagnostics pass correct number of arguments #59419
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Avoid directly exposing temporary storage streams #59431
    Area-IDE
  • Move net450 targets to net462 #59350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for decoding required members in metadata #59288
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiple @page on razor pages #40132
  • Blazor InputNumber Component Basic Validation (ParsingError) does not work in case of int? (nullable int/decimal/...) #40131
  • Perf improvement: mvc #40126
  • blazor: Virtualize does not respond to items with CSS Flex #40123
  • Cannot Inject ApplicationUser into Controller .NET CORE6 #40117
  • 'dotnet watch run' not loading static styles in the wwwroot of a razor class library #40116
  • Cannot integrate into other SPA because of <base /> mismatch #40114
  • 'atob' on Window error on .NET 6.0 #40113
  • Signalr hub inject service #40112
  • Perf improvement: json_actix #40111
  • Does not contain a public invokable method #40110
  • Command-line build fails on Apple M1 silicon during the `restore.sh` step #40109
  • All the strings.json files can be removed #40107
    7.0-preview2

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET Core 3.1 Release, validation-aspnetcore-.NET Core 3.1 Release, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-107590-.NETCore3.1Release #36318
  • Sending byte array with SignalR NewtonsoftJsonProtocol #40069
  • More API docs #27538
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation bug with AddRazorRuntimeCompilation() to an ASP.NET Core Web App (MVC) project #40066
  • Blazor WebAssembly authentication relaying on archived oidc-clinet.js #35825
  • JSON string content is null in Put action when request is done using fetch #39826
  • .Net Core 3.1 - Incorrect matching of endpoint template #40070
  • Blazor IDisposable not working #39953
  • Cannot wait on monitors on this runtime #40096

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Break apart <UseSingleProject> and enable more defaults via `<UseMaui>` #4619
  • Clearing BindableProperty causes styles properties to disappear #4617
  • IVisualTreeElement.GetVisualParent returns null for elements in Border #4614
  • VisualTreeElementExtensions.GetVisualTreeElements does not work for transformed elements #4613
  • Hot Reload not refresh the UI if apply changes related with sizing (Padding, Margin, etc) #4611
  • [Android] Crash updating FontSize using HotReload #4610
  • Grid RowDefinition Heigth Binding not working #4609
  • A CarouselPage so that we can swipe between different Pages without using templates. #4606
  • In shell App, PresentationMode.Modal does not hide NavigationBar for Top level Page #4603

Closed

  • dotnet workload install maui-android failing #3091
  • [Bug] Unable to install workloads #3087
  • [Bug] tvos and macos are missing after installation of Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4 #2586
  • [Bug] .NET 6.0 RC 1 MAUI workloads update failed. #2499
  • [Bug] Debug for Windows App Fails Deployment: Need recipe file #2493
  • [Bug] The IDE has some errors after using the template to create the MAUI project #2490
  • Lots of build Error when Creating MAUI Blazor App using VS2022 File New Project Template #2168
  • [Bug] - Error installing maui workload - NU3004: Package signature validation failed #2025
  • [Bug] Missing framework Microsoft.Maui.Extensions #1982
  • Existing android SDK/adb/openJDK install not recognized #1821
  • [Bug] I'm getting the `NETSDK1139: The target platform identifier maccatalyst was not recognized.` error #1795
  • Install/Upgrade scenario with new host builder pattern #2630
  • [Bug] HttpClient crashes on Android #1260
  • [Bug] .NET MAUI Blazor App crashed on physical device #3060
  • Blazor with maui can not use <InputSelect> or <select> #4325

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression in 6.0.2: The variable name '@p0' has already been declared. #27427
  • Group By Failure - Translation of 'Select' which contains grouping parameter without composition is not supported. #27426
  • Package manager prompt hangs #27425
    7.0.0
  • Union issue with only one join query #27424
  • Renaming and dropping columns with Temporal Tables generates faulty migration #27423
  • How to separate entity's primary key from base class? #27421
  • Is it by design for In-Memory provider that BeingTransactionAsync returns value, but Database.CurrentTransaction stays null? #27420

Closed

  • IQueryable.Count() throws InvalidOperationException #27370
  • Support for "Named Arguments" #27413
  • Cannot consume scoped service from singleton #27326

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] SQLite: Don't modify collection while enumerating inside ReclaimLeakedConnections #27428
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #27380
    Servicing-more-info, 6.0.3
  • Cosmos: Add IS_DEFINED() function to cosmos provider #27344
    waiting-for-response
